en: Daddy Pig has made Mummy Pig breakfast in bed.
zh: 猪爸爸给猪妈妈做了一份早餐端到床上。

en: Peppa and George have made Mummy Pig a birthday card.
zh: 佩奇和乔治给猪妈妈做了一张生日卡。

en: Ooh! What a lovely birthday surprise!
zh: 哦！多么美好的生日惊喜！

en: And there are more surprises to come!
zh: 还有更多的惊喜接着来哦！

en: Quick! We have to get everything else ready!
zh: 快！我们得准备好其他的事了！

en: Daddy Pig has made a birthday cake for Mummy Pig.
zh: 猪爸爸给猪妈妈做了一个生日蛋糕。

en: We've just got to put the candles on!
Mummy Pig has finished her birthday breakfast.
zh: 猪妈妈吃完她的生日早餐了。

en: Oh, no. we're not ready yet.
zh: 哦，不行。我们还没有准备好呢。

en: It's Mummy. Can I come in?
Is there something secret going on?
Er, no, nothing's going on. But you can't come in.
zh: 呃，没有，什么也没有。但是你不能进来。

en: Mummy Pig, why don't you relax in the sitting room?
zh: 猪妈妈，为什么你不在客厅里休息一下？

en: Ok, Peppa, I think I know where the sitting room is!
zh: 好的，佩奇，我想我知道客厅在哪的！

en: We need the same number of candles as Mummy's age.
zh: 我们需要插上与妈妈年龄一样多的蜡烛。

en: Oh, dear. We haven't got nearly enough candles.
zh: 哦，糟糕。我们没有足够的蜡烛。

en: I'll whisper it in your ear.
zh: 我在你耳边悄声告诉你。

en: You know, I think three candles will be fine.
zh: 你知道吗，我想也许三支蜡烛就好了。

en: Mummy Pig's birthday cake is ready!
zh: 猪妈妈的生日蛋糕准备好了！

en: We just have to put up the decorations in the sitting room.
zh: 我们还要装饰一下客厅。

en: There you all are! I was getting a little bored.
zh: 你们都在啊！我感觉有点无聊了！

en: Mummy? Would you like to have a nice walk in the garden?
zh: 妈妈？你想不想去花园里走走？

en: Bye bye, Mummy! Have a lovely walk!
zh: 再见，妈妈！好好散散步吧！

en: We'll call you when it's safe to come back in.
zh: 等可以回来时我们会叫你的。

en: I'd forgotten what hard work birthdays were!
zh: 我都忘记了过个生日还是很麻烦的。

en: Daddy Pig, Peppa and George are decorating the sitting room.
zh: 猪爸爸，佩奇，乔治在装饰客厅。

en: Granny and Grandpa Pig have arrived for Mummy Pig's birthday.
zh: 猪奶奶和猪爷爷也来庆祝猪妈妈的生日。

en: Oh, I can't come in yet.
Daddy Pig, Peppa and George are doing secret things for my birthday.
zh: 猪爸爸，佩奇和乔治正在秘密地准备我的生日。

en: Mummy! Would you like to come inside now?

zh: 眼睛要一直闭着哦，妈妈！

en: Blow the candles out and make a wish!

zh: 妈妈，妈妈，打开你的礼物！

en: Can you guess what it is?
zh: 你能猜到它是什么东西吗？
原来是一条漂亮的裙子！

en: Now you just need somewhere nice to wear it.
zh: 现在你只需要某个好地方来配这件衣服。

en: Two tickets to the theater! Tonight!
Mummy Pig loves going to the theater.
And Granny Pig and I are going to baby-sit the little ones.
zh: 猪奶奶和我会照顾小猪们的。

en: I'm the luckiest Mummy in the whole world!
zh: 我是世上最幸运的妈妈！
